column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday February 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: UPDATE:  Traffic Alert for New Circle Rd at Harrodsburg Rd:
column4: All lanes are back open on the outer loop side.  One lane open on the inner loop side, with one lane remainin blocked due to an additional collision.
UPDATE:  Rosemont Garden at Southland Dr / Lafayette Pkwy
column5: Intersection closed thru at least Monday 2/6 late night due to repairs on a 16" water main break and damaged communication lines.
